name: fpl-optimizer
description: Fantasy Premier League team optimization tool

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:api" "pnpm run dev:web" "pnpm run dev:ml"
scripts.dev:ml: cd apps/ml && source venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 3002
scripts.build: pnpm run build:api && pnpm run build:web
scripts.clean: pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.train:ml: cd apps/ml && source venv/bin/activate && python3 fpl_predictor.py
scripts.predict:ml: cd apps/ml && source venv/bin/activate && python3 test_predictions.py
